name: Divine Intervention
trigger: when you call on your deity or pantheon to intervene
effects: choose any cleric spell of level 5 or lower that does not require a reaction
cast it as part of the same action without expending a spell slot or material components
limits: you cannot use this feature again until you finish a long rest
